sentences.english: If we think about it, wind chill is an ill-defined concept.
sentences.chinese: 仔細想來，風寒是一個定義不清楚的概念。

sentences.english: Lu heavy, cold, song dance Innocent Steps.
I slept somewhat late owing to my slight cold, which seems now to have subsided.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我有曾略受風寒而晏起，風寒現已消退。

sentences.english: I slept somewhat late owing to my slight cold, which seems now to have subsided.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我有曾略受風寒而晏起，風寒現已消退。

sentences.english: Quinine is a cure for colds.
sentences.chinese: 金雞納霜是治療風寒的藥方。

sentences.english: Comrade, I wish you bon voyage, be careful in the midnight cold north wind.
sentences.chinese: 戰友，祝你一路平安，當心夜半北風寒。

sentences.english: Anti-worms, eliminate pains, cure cold and eczema.
sentences.chinese: 殺蟲驅蟲，止痛，治療風寒感冒及溼疹。

sentences.english: Windchill increases the hazards in cold regions.
sentences.chinese: 風寒指數會增加寒冷區域的危險性。

sentences.english: Warm clothing will keep out the cold.
sentences.chinese: 暖和的衣服可以御風寒。

sentences.english: Aim To research the clinical efficacy of Fengtongning Pill FTN on treatment of Bi syndrome induced by wind, cold and dampness.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察風溼痛消丸治療風寒溼痹病的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Not only the evils of wind, cold, dampness and heat, but also depression of gan-qi can result in bi-zheng.
sentences.chinese: 痹證病因非獨感風寒溼熱等外邪所致，肝鬱也可致痹。

sentences.english: Give her your jacket when she's chilly.
sentences.chinese: 夜涼風寒時，爲她披上你的外套。

sentences.english: Kathy caught a bad chill during winter vacation.
sentences.chinese: 凱西寒假時得到了嚴重的風寒。

sentences.english: Sometimes weather is cold hands and feet were frostbitten, and by the cold, got rheumatism.
sentences.chinese: 有時天氣特別冷，手腳都凍傷了，受風寒，得了風溼。

sentences.english: More rest, drinking plenty of water, if it is cold water to drink ginger brown sugar.
sentences.chinese: 多休息，多喝水，如果是風寒就喝點紅糖姜水。

sentences.english: The wind chill factor was pegged at a bone-chilling minus 27 degress.
sentences.chinese: 風寒因子測定爲嚴寒徹骨的零下27度。

definition: to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
